facts.text: My blue stripe actually glows! Special crystals in my skin reflect light to make my neon shine.
I can turn my glow on and off! At night or when I'm scared, my bright colors fade to help me hide.
I love having friends! I swim in big groups called schools, and we move together like one giant fish.
I come from the Amazon's dark waters! My bright colors help my friends find me in the murky streams.
I'm tiny but mighty! Even though I'm only about an inch long, I can live for 5-8 years.

profile.habitat: Blackwater streams in the Amazon Basin
profile.diet: Tiny insects, worms, and plant matter
